tables.name: nondigital_adh433_v1
tables.description: Non-digital loan products data including Bank products like EDL, Cash Credit, OD/TD, and term loans

columns.name: reportdate
columns.description: Report date for the data snapshot

columns.name: product_name
columns.description: Name of the loan product (e.g., 'edl_migrated', 'Cash Credit', 'term_loan_to_fi')

columns.name: branch_code
columns.description: Branch code where the loan was originated (333 for OS region, others for NE region)

columns.name: final_outstanding
columns.description: Final outstanding amount for the loan

tables.name: outstanding_daily
tables.description: Daily outstanding balances for digital loans including Credin, Credit Card, and other digital products

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique order identifier

columns.name: order_type
columns.description: Type of order (e.g., 'credin', 'credit_card', 'no_cost_emi')

columns.name: principal_outstanding
columns.description: Principal amount outstanding

columns.name: settlement_flag
columns.description: Settlement status ('settled' or 'unsettled')

columns.name: last_day
columns.description: Last day of the reporting period

columns.name: nbfc_name_colending
columns.description: NBFC name for co-lending

columns.name: parent_nbfc_name
columns.description: Parent NBFC name

tables.name: da_orders
tables.description: DA (Deferred Annuity) orders information including DA dates

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique order identifier

columns.name: da_date
columns.description: DA (Deferred Annuity) date for the order

tables.name: writeoff_users
tables.description: List of orders that have been written off

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique order identifier for written off loans

tables.name: provisional_writeoff
tables.description: List of orders that have been provisionally written off

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique order identifier for provisionally written off loans

tables.name: kb_adh433
tables.description: Khatabook loan products data with ledger balances

columns.name: reportdate
columns.description: Report date for the data snapshot

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique order identifier

columns.name: leadger_balance
columns.description: Ledger balance for the Khatabook loan

columns.name: write_off_flag
columns.description: Write-off flag ('Y' or 'N')

columns.name: arc_flag
columns.description: ARC flag (NULL, 'N', or 'NULL' string)

columns.name: settled_flag
columns.description: Settlement flag ('Y' or 'N')

columns.name: originator
columns.description: Originator name (should be 'khatabook' for Khatabook products)

tables.name: da_adh433
tables.description: DA (Deferred Annuity) products data grouped by partner

columns.name: reportdate
columns.description: Report date for the data snapshot

columns.name: partner_name
columns.description: Partner name for the DA product

columns.name: leadger_balance
columns.description: Ledger balance for the DA loan
